# Disciplinary Case Summary

## Headline
Inquiry Against Shri K.K. Tardia, Regional Controller of Mines

## Executive Summary
This document outlines the initiation of a disciplinary inquiry against Shri K.K. Tardia, Regional Controller of Mines, Indian Bureau of Mines. The inquiry is being conducted under Rule 14 of the Central Civil Services (Classification, Control and Appeal) Rules, 1965. Shri Upendra C. Joshi, Joint Secretary, Ministry of Mines, has been appointed as the Inquiring Authority to investigate the charges framed against Shri K.K. Tardia.
